item.title: By: lawrence kaplan
item.dc:creator: lawrence kaplan
item.description: Alan: Thank you for referring to my article and for your kind remarks. I think your placing the Rackman /Soloveitchik dispute in the context of legal theory is very well taken and, as you say, adds an important dimension to my article. Perhaps I ought to have sent it to you for comments before I submitted it for publication! I welcome commments from bloggers who have read my article.
